lead_paragraph: The Boston Bruins were on the ropes after the first period — again. This time, they fought back for the victory.

headline.print_headline: Ryan Spooner Scores Twice in 3rd, Bruins Beat Sabres 4-2
headline.main: Ryan Spooner Scores Twice in 3rd, Bruins Beat Sabres 4-2
